original_title: A Little Fellow from Gambo: The Joey Smallwood Story
overview: This feature-length documentary paints a lively portrait of Father of Confederation and first premier of Newfoundland Joseph Roberts Smallwood, or "Joey," as he is known to most Canadians. Following one of Canadaâ€™s most colourful political figures during a two-and-a-half-month period that included a stormy Liberal leadership convention, the film reveals a man misunderstood even by his close associates.
title: A Little Fellow from Gambo: The Joey Smallwood Story
